I have tried to compile the latest version on a 64 bit Linux
installation (=
FC 4), but an out-of-the-box compilation fails. I admit
that I haven't spen=
d a significant effort on resolving  the
compilation errors, but just out o=
f curiosity I would like to know if
anyone has been successful compiling Ca=
ntera on 64 bit architectures?

/Martin
